# AppCUI-rs

![Windows Build Status](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/actions/workflows/windows.yml/badge.svg) ![Linux Build Status](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/actions/workflows/linux.yml/badge.svg) ![MacOS Build Status](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/actions/workflows/macos.yml/badge.svg) ![Code Coverage](https://gist.githubusercontent.com/gdt050579/f7d7e7d56b2725a3b33a265e8a9d8e9c/raw/coverage.svg) ![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs) [![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/appcui.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/appcui) [![Docs.rs](https://docs.rs/appcui/badge.svg)](https://docs.rs/appcui) [![Gallery](https://img.shields.io/badge/Gallery-See%20Examples-blue)](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/gallery/screenshots.html) AppCUI-rs is a fast, cross-platform Rust library for building modern, text-based user interfaces (TUIs) with rich widgets, themes, and full Unicode support‚Äîan alternative to ncurses and other terminal UI frameworks. * [Book](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/) * [Documentation](https://docs.rs/appcui) * [Gallery](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/gallery/screenshots.html) ## ‚ú® Features - [x] multiple out-of-the-box controls (buttons, labels, text boxes, check boxes, radio buttons, list views, tree views, combo boxes, date/time pickers, color pickers, tabs, accordeons, etc.). A full list of controls can be found [here](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/stock_controls.html) - [x] powerful layout system that allows you to position controls using absolute coordinates, relative coordinates, docking, alignment, anchors or pivot positioning (see more [here](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/layout.html)) - [x] menus and toolbars - [x] multi-platform support (Windows via API and virtual terminal, Linux via ncurses, MacOS via termios) - [x] multi-threading support to allow background tasks - [x] timers - [x] mouse support - [x] clipboard support - [x] color themes - [x] support for Unicode characters - [x] predefined dialogs (message box, input box, color picker, save & open dialogs, folder navigator, etc) - [x] true colors support (24 bits per pixel) for terminals that supports it. ## üì∏ Screenshots üëâ **Check out the [Gallery](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/gallery/screenshots.html) for full demos of all controls!** ## üñ•Ô∏è Backends AppCUI supports various backends based on the operating system it is being used for:
Translation: ![Windows Build Status](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/actions/workflows/windows.yml/badge.svg) ![Linux Build Status](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/actions/workflows/linux.yml/badge.svg) ![MacOS Build Status](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/actions/workflows/macos.yml/badge.svg) ![Code Coverage](https://gist.githubusercontent.com/gdt050579/f7d7e7d56b2725a3b33a265e8a9d8e9c/raw/coverage.svg) ![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs) [![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/appcui.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/appcui) [![Docs.rs](https://docs.rs/appcui/badge.svg)](https://docs.rs/appcui) [![Gallery](https://img.shields.io/badge/Gallery-See%20Examples-blue)](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/gallery/screenshots.html) AppCUI-rs ist eine schnelle, plattform√ºbergreifende Rust-Bibliothek zur Erstellung moderner, textbasierter Benutzeroberfl√§chen (TUIs) mit umfangreichen Widgets, Themes und voller Unicode-Unterst√ºtzung‚Äîeine Alternative zu ncurses und anderen Terminal-UI-Frameworks. * [Buch](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/) * [Dokumentation](https://docs.rs/appcui) * [Galerie](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/gallery/screenshots.html) ## ‚ú® Funktionen - [x] mehrere sofort einsatzbereite Steuerelemente (Buttons, Labels, Textfelder, Checkboxen, Radiobuttons, Listenansichten, Baumansichten, Kombinationsfelder, Datums-/Zeitw√§hler, Farbw√§hler, Tabs, Akkordeons usw.). Eine vollst√§ndige Liste der Steuerelemente finden Sie [hier](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/stock_controls.html) - [x] leistungsstarkes Layout-System, das es erm√∂glicht, Steuerelemente mit absoluten Koordinaten, relativen Koordinaten, Docking, Ausrichtung, Ankern oder Pivot-Positionierung zu platzieren (mehr dazu [hier](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-3/layout.html)) - [x] Men√ºs und Werkzeugleisten - [x] Multi-Plattform-Unterst√ºtzung (Windows √ºber API und virtuelles Terminal, Linux √ºber ncurses, MacOS √ºber termios) - [x] Multithreading-Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr Hintergrundaufgaben - [x] Timer - [x] Mausunterst√ºtzung - [x] Zwischenablage-Unterst√ºtzung - [x] Farb-Themes - [x] Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr Unicode-Zeichen - [x] vordefinierte Dialoge (Meldungsbox, Eingabebox, Farbw√§hler, Speichern- & √ñffnen-Dialoge, Ordnernavigator usw.) - [x] True-Color-Unterst√ºtzung (24 Bit pro Pixel) f√ºr Terminals, die dies unterst√ºtzen. ## üì∏ Screenshots üëâ **Schauen Sie sich die [Galerie](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/gallery/screenshots.html) f√ºr vollst√§ndige Demos aller Steuerelemente an!** ## üñ•Ô∏è Backends AppCUI unterst√ºtzt verschiedene Backends, abh√§ngig vom verwendeten Betriebssystem:

RowTranslations.originContent: AppCUI supports various backends based on the operating system it is being used for:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: AppCUI unterst√ºtzt verschiedene Backends, abh√§ngig vom verwendeten Betriebssystem:

Content:
* **Windows Console** - based on Win32 low level API, design for clasical windows console
* **Windows VT** - based on ANSI sequances, designed for modern windows virtual terminals
* **NCurses** - based on NCurses API for linux envinronments
* **Termios** - based on ANSI sequances and low level APIs for MAC OSX
* **Web Terminal** - designed for Web implementation (based on webgl)
* **CrossTerm** - based on the `crossterm` crate, but enabled via a feature flag

More on the supported backends can be found [here](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-2/backends.html)


## üöÄ Quick Start

Add the following to your `Cargo.toml`:

* **Windows VT** - basiert auf ANSI-Sequenzen, entwickelt f√ºr moderne Windows-Virtual-Terminals
* **NCurses** - basiert auf der NCurses-API f√ºr Linux-Umgebungen
* **Termios** - basiert auf ANSI-Sequenzen und Low-Level-APIs f√ºr MAC OSX
* **Web-Terminal** - entwickelt f√ºr Web-Implementierungen (basiert auf WebGL)
* **CrossTerm** - basiert auf dem `crossterm`-Crate, aber √ºber ein Feature-Flag aktiviert

Weitere Informationen zu den unterst√ºtzten Backends finden Sie [hier](https://gdt050579.github.io/AppCUI-rs/chapter-2/backends.html)

Content:
Then run the project with `cargo run`. You should see a window with the title `Test` and the text `Hello World !` in the center.

## üß™ Examples

AppCUI-rs comes with a set of examples to help you get started. You can find them in the [examples](examples) folder, including:
- **Games** such as [Tic Tac Toe](examples/tic-tac-toe/), [Snake](examples/snake/), [Flappy Bird](examples/flappy), [Minesweeper](examples/minesweeper/), [Ram it](examples/ramit/), [PacMan](examples/games/), [Chees](examples/games/), [Connect Four](examples/games/), [2048](examples/games/) or [Tetris](examples/games/)
- **Utilities** such as [Calculator](examples/calculator/), [CSV Viewer](examples/csv_viewer/), [Temperature Converter](examples/temperature_convertor/) or a [Timer](examples/timer/)
- **Animations** such as [Matrix](examples/matrix/), [Fractals](examples/fractals/) or [Spiral](examples/spiral/)
- **Controls**/**Widgets** such as [Button](examples/buttons/), [CheckBox](examples/checkboxes/), [ComboBox](examples/combobox/), [DatePicker](examples/datepicker/), [ListView](examples/listview/), [TreeView](examples/treeview/) and many more.
- **Dialogs** such as [Notification](examples/notification_dialogs/) or [Input](examples/input_dialog/)

## üõ†Ô∏è A more complex example

Am example that creates a window with a button that when pressed increases a counter.
Translation:
Dann f√ºhren Sie das Projekt mit `cargo run` aus. Sie sollten ein Fenster mit dem Titel `Test` und dem Text `Hello World !` in der Mitte sehen.

## üß™ Beispiele

AppCUI-rs enth√§lt eine Reihe von Beispielen, um Ihnen den Einstieg zu erleichtern. Sie finden diese im Ordner [examples](examples), darunter:
- **Spiele** wie [Tic Tac Toe](examples/tic-tac-toe/), [Snake](examples/snake/), [Flappy Bird](examples/flappy), [Minesweeper](examples/minesweeper/), [Ram it](examples/ramit/), [PacMan](examples/games/), [Chees](examples/games/), [Connect Four](examples/games/), [2048](examples/games/) oder [Tetris](examples/games/)
- **Dienstprogramme** wie [Rechner](examples/calculator/), [CSV Viewer](examples/csv_viewer/), [Temperaturumrechner](examples/temperature_convertor/) oder ein [Timer](examples/timer/)
- **Animationen** wie [Matrix](examples/matrix/), [Fraktale](examples/fractals/) oder [Spirale](examples/spiral/)
- **Controls**/**Widgets** wie [Button](examples/buttons/), [CheckBox](examples/checkboxes/), [ComboBox](examples/combobox/), [DatePicker](examples/datepicker/), [ListView](examples/listview/), [TreeView](examples/treeview/) und viele mehr.
- **Dialoge** wie [Benachrichtigung](examples/notification_dialogs/) oder [Eingabe](examples/input_dialog/)

## üõ†Ô∏è Ein komplexeres Beispiel

Ein Beispiel, das ein Fenster erstellt, mit einem Button, der beim Dr√ºcken einen Z√§hler erh√∂ht.

## üõ£Ô∏è Roadmap

- [x] Basic set of widgets and support for Windows, Linux and MacOS
- [x] WebGL support
- [ ] OpenGL / SDL / Vulkan support
- [ ] TextArea support for code highlighting

## ü§ù Contributing

Contributions, issues, and feature requests are welcome!  
Check out [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) to get started.

Join the discussion in [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/discussions).

## üõ£Ô∏è Fahrplan

- [x] Grundlegende Widget-Sammlung und Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr Windows, Linux und MacOS
- [x] WebGL-Unterst√ºtzung
- [ ] OpenGL- / SDL- / Vulkan-Unterst√ºtzung
- [ ] TextArea-Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr Syntaxhervorhebung

## ü§ù Beitrag leisten

Beitr√§ge, Probleme und Feature-Anfragen sind willkommen!  
Schau dir [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) an, um loszulegen.

Beteilige dich an der Diskussion in [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/gdt050579/AppCUI-rs/discussions).
